website_summaries.verdict: Concentrated septic tank application with smaller pods, which reduces chances of a toilet clog or backup.
pros: Treatment that ships in pre-measured pods, so it's extremely easy to apply
Reasonable price point for the monthly application
Uses a concentrated formula, but it's still safe to use with different plumbing pipes and septic systems
cons: Some quality control issues in terms of packages arriving punctured and broken

customer_reviews.title: Of no use, return rejected
customer_reviews.text: I bought the product on the basis of a neighbor's recommendation when we thought our 15-year-old septic system was plugged and overflowing. It was the first time we had any problem. Zep had no effect on that problem and when we had our septic service provider out to address the problem he advised us that Zep's was of no value at best and could be harmful. He found the problem (a leak in the pipe adjacent to the tank) and fixed it. He also told us that our system was working well and didn't need what Zep promised to do. When I tried to return several boxes of the expensive product they refused my request. That stinks.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Casey Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Better then the more exspensive brand and cheaper too!
customer_reviews.text: Just had are septic tank pumped and zep was recommended by the service guy who pumped are sepetic tank. He said don't waste your money on r_d-x, zep works just as well for about a third of the price. And Amazon has it at a terrific price!
customer_reviews.author: HG

customer_reviews.title: Exp Septi-paks Wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two packages one package had a few pouchs broken Amazon customer service took care of it pleasantly and quickly. The product works awesome my daughter uses Zep Septi-pal and recommend it to me.I will keep ordering this produce. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Rose Kincannon

customer_reviews.title: The product works great but it is getting harder and harder to find
customer_reviews.text: The product works great but it is getting harder and harder to find. The package arrived with three of the six packets broken open. I had to pour all the loose content into a measuring cup and divide by three. This defeated the purpose of the handy pre-measures packets.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Fritchman

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this stuff for years and am a satisfied customer. Found this excellent price, so purchased it. If it stays this way, will purchase again on future buys. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Lipsi

customer_reviews.title: Works for me.
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using these for 10 years and haven't had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: mjcali

customer_reviews.title: Once a month!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using Zep septic treatment for as long as I remember. Keeps everything running.
customer_reviews.author: Lenslady1

customer_reviews.title: ZEP
customer_reviews.text: Famous brand, great price does the trick I use once per month, very easy to do
customer_reviews.author: tc5k

customer_reviews.title: Zep ZSTP6 Septi-Pack Concentrated Septic Treatment 12 Ounces
customer_reviews.text: Supposed to be 6 pack, only had 4 in the packet
customer_reviews.author: Samson

customer_reviews.title: Simple monthly chore
customer_reviews.text: Extremely simple to use. However, I don’t submerge the plastic wrapper but rather, I just empty the enzymes directly into the water. Walk away for five minutes then flush. Best to do this at night after everyone is sleeping for best results
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Taurino

customer_reviews.title: Must be old or less effective
customer_reviews.text: Having bought this brand of enzymes before from somewhere else, I know they work quite well for my RV. However this one I received ended up smelling muskier than usual and it’s possibly that the package is just not very fresh. My home still ends up smelling like an outhouse. That somewhat defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Serenah E

customer_reviews.title: these are super large
customer_reviews.text: i have bought similar products to maintain septic system and when these came they were 4x larger than previous ones (different brand but same style) they flushed fine though
customer_reviews.author: L. Tax

customer_reviews.title: Great prices
customer_reviews.text: I have a 13 year old Lab and this has helped him.
customer_reviews.author: John Rasdel

customer_reviews.title: Flush your troubles down the drain
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the septic tank guy away, I use 2 pks every other month and works great
customer_reviews.author: Hermit

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Effective. Easy to use! I found this product after I had septic tank issues and have been using it for over 2 years. NO more problems! I highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: SherryC

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product monthly and have never had any issues.

customer_reviews.title: No worries
customer_reviews.text: Been using for years. So easy to use and much less expensive then other brands. Have been trouble free with this product.

customer_reviews.title: Bacteria for cesspool
customer_reviews.text: Bacteria for cesspool and this gives you it at a small price, cheaper than home depot

customer_reviews.title: Zep Septi-Pack Concentrated Treatment works !
customer_reviews.text: We use the Zep Septi-Pack in our toilets to keep our septic system healthy.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: We use one every month. So far so good - no issues with our septic. Just place in the toilet and you're done!

customer_reviews.title: Solid product!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Zep Septi-Pack has the same ingredients as Rid-X and is a fraction of the cost.

customer_reviews.title: Septic aid
customer_reviews.text: Product has bacterial content to breakdown waste in septic without harming the system.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as described (at least as far as I can tell!) Pricey.

customer_reviews.title: I was not comfortable opening the package with exposed product
customer_reviews.text: I'm with the others who's main complaint is with the shipping of this product. I have no idea if it works as advertised or not because many of the pouches were destroyed when it arrived with pouch contents loose inside packaging. I was not comfortable opening the package with exposed product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product is great..
customer_reviews.text: The product is great... but the posted cost on Amazon is about TWICE what I paid for at a local Home Depot. Again, its awesome and does the trick, but check prices before splashing $23 on what Home Depot charges $12.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Da Ponte

customer_reviews.title: Makes septic treatment super easy
customer_reviews.text: Love these things, makes it so easy to remember and use right amount of septic treatment. I just pop 1 packet in on the first of every month. Only weird thing was this bag I bought looked like a pack had Brocken open inside and was loose material, also was a different color than other packs I have gotten, almost looked like sawdust. Hoping all still works ok though, as far as I know, it does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I ordered this and this bag had 3 busted treatments in it and only 3 treatments that where good. Very unhappy with this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: michelle dilluvio

customer_reviews.title: We love this brand for our septic but these arrived all ...

customer_reviews.author: CindiS

customer_reviews.title: Oh sh_t.
customer_reviews.text: I have been reading some articles which said that this product may not be necessary. I do not know.
